DOC.brief_title: A Community Based Approach Reducing Rural Cancer Disparities
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To evaluate modify version CC & S may reduce health disparity . Specific Aim : To evaluate impact participation CC & S educational session cancer prevention screen . Study Design : To evaluate impact participation CC & S educational session cancer prevention screen . The investigator recruit 60 community member ; 30 receive CC & S training ( intervention group ) 30 ( control group ) . All 60 survey intent change behavior begin study actual behavior change screen behavior 6 month begin study . Goal : The overall goal develop culturally appropriate easy disseminate educational intervention document improve cancer prevention increase cancer screen behavior rural Midwest .
